name: John's Hell
description:
Description

Simple and short first person horror. Your task is to find out about your brother's death, but also to survive. Most of the time you have to walk and explore the warehouse but be careful because you never know what's around the corner.

Story

You play as John, who wants to find out something about the death of his brother in a warehouse he bought while he was alive. The deeper you go into it, the more you will learn about your sins.



It's better to play on headphones, because it's a horror.

The game lasts half an hour.
